tool_description: Creates properly formatted FOIA request letters with all required elements, legal language, and agency-specific formatting requirements.

agency_name.description: Full name of the target agency

requester_name.description: Full legal name of the person making the request

date_range_start.description: Start date for record search range

date_range_end.description: End date for record search range

requester_category.description: Requester type: individual, media, academic, commercial, nonprofit

preferred_format.description: Preferred format: electronic, paper, or either

error_messages: Missing required contact information: Ensure all requester contact fields (name, address, email, phone) are provided.
Invalid requester category: Use one of [individual, media, academic, commercial, nonprofit].
Invalid date range: End date must be after start date when both are provided.
Fee waiver justification required: When fee_waiver_requested is true, provide fee_waiver_justification.
Expedited justification required: When expedited_processing is true, provide expedited_justification.
Request description too vague: Provide more specific details about the requested records.
usage: Provide all required requester information, agency name, detailed request description, and requester category. Optionally add date ranges, fee waiver requests, and expedited processing. Returns a properly formatted FOIA request letter.

estimated_pages.description: Estimated number of pages in formatted request
